'''Sefana''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Realm of Farakhkert]], [[Sumeru]]. She is a member of the [[Pari]] that takes care of the [[Sunyata Flower]]s in the [[Vourukasha Oasis]].

==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Before completing Step 15 of [[The Splendorous Sky That Day]])
:'''Sefana:''' Please... please don't talk to me! I'm worried and scared and my brain's a mess... Sorry!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(After completing Hidden Exploration Objective [[The Flowing Spring of Life]])
:'''Sefana:''' Oh. It's [[Sorush]]'s Yasnapati! Is there anything I can help you with?
:{{DIcon}} About the Sunyata Flowers...
::'''Sefana:''' The Sunyata Flowers have all fully recovered.
::'''Sefana:''' If you stay next to a Sunyata Flower for a while, you might just hear its song!
:{{DIcon}} About Sorush...
::'''Sefana:''' Actually, there's a lot of interesting stuff I can tell you about Sorush.
::'''Sefana:''' Though, I can't just whisper them to you behind her back... Ah. There will be opportunities to talk about her in the future!
::'''Sefana:''' Please come visit me more with Sorush!
:{{DIcon}} Sure thing. I'll see you next time!
::'''Sefana:''' Bye! I look forward to seeing you with Sorush next time!
{{Dialogue End}}
